casebody.data:
Block, Appellant, v. Littlefield, Warden, Appellee.

[Cite as Block v. Littlefield (1993), 66 Ohio St.3d 451.]

(No. 93-507 Submitted May 25, 1993 Decided June 23, 1993.) Samuel Block, pro se. Lee I. Fisher, Attorney General, and John J. Gideon, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

The cause is affirmed for the reasons stated in the court of appeals’ opinion.

*452Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. F.E. Sweeney, J., dissents and would reverse.
